answers.answer: Have they checked to see if You have any scar tissue in your uterus? I lost my baby at 22wk gestation due to so much scar tissue. i had a HSG done which shows scar tissue in my Uterus

question: Hi Everyone.  It is now 2 cycles since my last m/c and am trying again this month with Femara.Today did CD3 testing for LH/FSH/Estradiol.  Will get those results on Friday. Hope they're all good.So far all the tests have come back negative with no explanation for the recent 3 consecutive losses.Obe and Immunologist discussed. Immunologist thinks there are immune issues (just they haven't identified them yet).  They've got me taking low dose aspirin.  A few more tests to be done (IF they're not too expensive).  Trigger is target date 9th May, and IUI target 10th May.Am working on regular exercise (bought a treadmill which I have been using daily).  Hope this helps.  Regular exercise increases blood flow to the reproductive organs and will also help in management of my diabetes.  Will cut out coffee next week (am enjoying my last week of coffee this week), and my last glass of wine for this cycle tonight.If this attempt succeeds (and sticks) the new baby would have the same or nearly the same birthday as my daughter.Fingers, toes, and wires crossed! :)
title: Another Fertility Treatment Cycle
